exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce monotonic to an evaluable reference.

In environment A : Type X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y R : relation2 X Y E : relation2 X X T : relation2 Y Y H : simulation TY TY T The term "TY" has type "Lbl A -> relation Y" while it is expected to have type "Lbl A -> Y -> Prop" (cannot unify "Y -> Prop" and "Prop").
The reference monotonic_comp_l was not found in the current environment.

In environment A : Type X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y R : relation2 X Y E : relation2 X X T : relation2 Y Y H : simulation TY TY T Unable to unify "simulation TY TY T" with "increasing (chaining_r T)".

In environment A : Type X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y R : relation2 X Y E : relation2 X X T : relation2 Y Y H : simulation TY TY T x : ?M1518 y : ?M1519 Unable to unify "incl (chaining_r T x) (chaining_r T y)" with "incl x y".
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
The reference chaining_r_monotonic was not found in the current environment.

In environment A : Type X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y R : relation2 X Y E : relation2 X X T : relation2 Y Y H : simulation TY TY T R0, S : relation2 X Y H0 : evolve_t TX TY R0 S H1 : incl R0 S Unable to unify "simulation TY TY T" with "evolve_t TX TY (chaining_r T R0) (chaining_r T S)".
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
The reference simulation_mono was not found in the current environment.

In environment A : Type X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y R : relation2 X Y E : relation2 X X T : relation2 Y Y H : simulation TY TY T R0, S : relation2 X Y H0 : evolve TX TY R0 S H1 : incl R0 S Unable to unify "simulation TY TY T" with "evolve_a TX TY (chaining_r T R0) (chaining_r T S)".

original: intros. unfold simulation, monotonic, chaining_r. intros. apply mkmon. + intros. apply mon_a with (R := TY) (S := TY). * apply monotonic_comp_l with (Z := Y). apply H. * apply incl_refl. + intros. apply chaining_r_monotonic with (R := T). apply H. + intros. apply simulation_mono with (R := TY). apply H.
